name: kiwi-schema
description: A schema-based binary format for efficiently encoding trees of data

scripts.browser: tsc -p tsconfig.browser.json && rollup browser.js --format=iife --name=kiwi | terser -cm > browser.min.js
scripts.typedefs: tsc -d && ls *.ts | grep -v d.ts > .npmignore && echo tsconfig.json >> .npmignore
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run browser && npm run typedefs
